tree_elements.text: The Boys Tennis team captains senior Sahil Kumtakarand Aryan Chitnis talked about missing their final season.

Sahil said, “I was extremely disappointed about not being able to play tennis as part of our amazing varsity team. This season was especially important because after having represented my school in tennis every year, I was chosen to lead as the captain of the team. I was really looking forward to it and felt heartbroken at the lost opportunity.”

Aryan said, “It feels bad and it truly sucks that I am not able to play the sport I love with my amazing teammates and coaches. Being a captain this year and also being on the starting lineup meant a lot to me and it was very disappointing to see the season get canceled because of this pandemic.“
Despite the disappointment of not being able to play, these seniors have made their mark on the court. Sahil and Aryan have gone undefeated in singles and doubles respectively.

file_structural_elements.title: Boys Tennis seniors undefeated on court
